attributes.action: Improve awareness of Sarcoidosis amongst the medical community and public alike to reduce the time it takes to diagnose and treat this debilitating condition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sarcoidosis symptoms are frequently ignored or misdiagnosed as
cancer - even unnecessary organ removal. Symptoms depend on
which organs are affected but usually include tiredness, fever
& fatigue, feel extremely tired physically, mentally or
emotionally.

Most common organs affected are Lungs with a cough &
breathlessness. Heart can become enlarged & weak. This leads to
cardiomyopathy. In the nervous system it can mean weakness,
numbness, pins & needles. Brain & meninges can be affected
causing headaches, numb skin & weak muscles. Can raise calcium
levels in blood can lead to kidney stones. Liver & spleen may
become enlarged.

Large tender lumps on shins (erythema nodosum). Small nodules
or papules on skin or raised rash (lupus pernio) affects your
nose & cheeks. Lymph glands become swollen. Can make eyes red,
dry, painful & very sensitive to light. You can get pain in any
joint - frequently knees & ankles, often associated with
erythema nodosum.
